name: Strateq
overview: Strateq is like an enhanced version of Chess for two players. It is even more complex than Tactrix!, which is also found here in AmiNet. Strateq includes 14 different pieces, which have a fully-functional hit-point system. A multitude of different features are also included. Strateq was written in AMOS and requires at least 1 MB of total memory. The instructions are now in AmigaGuide format.
